医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
更大的高温暴露可能会加速老年人的生物衰老一项新的南加州大学伦纳德·戴维斯（Leonard Davis）老年学院研究表明，更大的暴露于极热的人可能会加速老年人的生物老化，这引起了人们对气候变化和热浪如何影响分子水平上的长期健康和衰老的新担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/greater-expuse-to-to-extreme-heat-heat-may-accelerate-biolate-biological-dogical-ingaging-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/greater-expuse-to-to-extreme-heat-heat-may-accelerate-biological-dogical-gaging-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3A0D1793-83A1-4CAB-BCA7-256EDCBB20EE Wed, 26 Feb 2025 21:49:49 -0500 Greater exposure to extreme heat may accelerate biological aging in seniors
加州大学洛杉矶分校的科学家发现了治疗胶质母细胞瘤的新方法加州大学洛杉矶分校的科学家通过将侵略性癌细胞重新编程为无害的癌细胞，确定了一种治疗胶质母细胞瘤（最致命形式的脑癌形式）的潜在新策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/ucla-scientists-discover-new-apphach-for-for-for-treating-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/ucla-scientists-discover-new-apphach-for-for-treating-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=275d4c5b-7caa-405E-985D-16717525E717 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 21:45:12 -0500 UCLA scientists discover new approach for treating glioblastoma
药物可能会为预防儿童和青少年偏头痛提供新的希望根据今天于2025年2月26日发布的初步研究，可能会在偏头痛的儿童和青少年中进行新的预防治疗，该研究将在2025年4月5日至9日在圣地亚哥和在线的美国神经病学会的第77届年度会议上介绍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/drug-may-offer-new-hope-for-for-preventing gimigraines-in-kids-kids-and-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/drug-may-offer-new-hope-for-for-for-migraines-in-kids-kids-and-kids-and-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9ff6e4d-3c20-4986-b2f7-322091abd269 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 21:10:02 -0500 Drug may offer new hope for preventing migraines in kids and teens
新研究确定了ALS诊断和监测的有效血液检查ALS或肌萎缩性侧索硬化症有时可能很难诊断或预测疾病可能进展的速度。一项新的研究有助于确定哪些血液测试最能识别和监测ALS。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-study-indistifies-effective-blood-tests-for-als-als-diangnosis-and-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-study-indistifies-effective-blood-tests-for-als-als-als-diengnosis-and-diengnosis-and-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2bd962d-5669-4507-b1ef-b1ef-bdf7b5e993d7 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 21:04:00 -0500 New study identifies effective blood tests for ALS diagnosis and monitoring
研究表明，锻炼会延迟阿尔茨海默氏症，但有一个陷阱常规的体育活动减慢了P-TAU181的积累，P-TAU181是一个关键的阿尔茨海默氏症的生物标志物，但是当tau水平较高时，其认知益处会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/research-shows-eccise-can-can-delay-alzheimere28099s but-theee28099S-a-catch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/research-shows-eccise-can-can-delay-alzheimere-28099s-but-theee28099s-a-a-catch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04F9C120-2937-408C-8D28-78DB3FE8F208 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 20:19:00 -0500 Research shows exercise can delay Alzheimer’s, but there’s a catch
您能相信Tiktok的营养建议吗？研究暴露了#whatieatinaday Tiktok优先考虑参与度而不是准确性，使年轻用户误导营养内容。研究人员敦促更严格的内容适度遏制错误信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/can-you-trust-tiktok-for-nutrition-nutrition-andrition-advice-study-exposes-exposes-whatieatinaday.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/can-you-trust-tiktok-for-nutrition-nutrition-andrition-advice-study--xudy-exposes-exposes-whatieatinay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=625c1a3e-eec8-4e7a-86c1-a645b369f170 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 19:43:00 -0500 Can you trust TikTok for nutrition advice? Study exposes #WhatIEatinaDay
通过饮用水污染暴露的PFA可能在儿童期癌症风险中发挥作用由加利福尼亚大学乔·旺·温（Joe C. Wen）人口与公共卫生学院领导的一项研究揭示了饮用水中接触人类和多氟烷基物质的联系与某些童年癌症的风险增加之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pfas-exposure-via-via-drinking-water-water-contamination-may-play-play-a----- role-in-Childhood-canccancer-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pfas-exposure-via-via-drinking-water-water-contamination-may-play-play-play-a-candhildhood-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=943225CA-93FE-4102-9D75-70154D3EFB00 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:50:48 -0500 PFAS exposure via drinking water contamination may play a role in childhood cancer risk
淀粉可能会影响您的口腔健康 - 对您的DNA养育康奈尔研究人员发现，AMY1的遗传变异是一种淀粉消化的基因，改变了口腔细菌的组成，影响了潜在的牙齿健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/starch-might-impt-impact-your-oral-healthe28094-depeperding-on-on-your-dna.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/starch-might-impt-impact-your-oral-healthe28094Depeping-on-on-your-dna.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B431B768-F4EB-468D-A359-5E6186118841 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:47:00 -0500 Starch might impact your oral health—depending on your DNA
试点研究探讨了阿尔茨海默氏症预防中塞溶剂的潜力一项称为耐力的新试验研究（减轻衰老中的流动性问题和神经系统障碍），该研究重点是鼻溶剂药物，达沙替尼和槲皮素（DQ）的影响，消除了体内的旧细胞（衰老）细胞，使间歇性治疗可能会在老年人的认知能力中有望提高老年人的认知能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pilot-study-explores-potential-potential-of-senolytics-in-alzheimers-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pilot-study-explores-potential-potential-potential-of-senolytics-in-alzheimers-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fc74508-72EF-4EBD-B23B-D14A299FC100 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:46:11 -0500 Pilot study explores potential of senolytics in Alzheimer's prevention
新研究发现大脑如何创建空间图大脑会创建内部“地图”，以帮助我们从周围的环境中导航和学习，但是这些地图如何仍然是一个理解的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-study-uncovers-how-the-the-brain-creates-spatial-maps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-study-uncovers-how-the-the-brain-creates-spatial-maps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=550AA889-F278-4ACA-8852-DCC2B4F2459D Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:39:33 -0500 New study uncovers how the brain creates spatial maps
